definitions.definition: Any color in plant or animal cells .
examples: Chlorophyll is the pigment responsible for most plants' green colouring.

definitions.definition: A dry colorant , usually an insoluble powder.
examples: Umber is a pigment made from clay containing iron and manganese oxide.

definitions.definition: Wine flavoured with spices and honey .

main_definition: ( biology ) Any color in plant or animal cells .
secondary_definitions: A dry colorant , usually an insoluble powder.
( obsolete ) Wine flavoured with spices and honey .
